archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0931
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a finance user, I am able to run a report that will show me all new customers for a specified period (including segment, connections, date provisioned and date service starts)

properties.value: Dedicated report. DX response: Yes. Mainly excel reports. Export to datalake, VF responsible to provide it in excel reports.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
